title: Build an e-commerce platform based on existing methodology
snippet:
We have purchased a set of instructions for building an e-commerce framework which also collects details and builds a mailing list.
The methodology is clear and easy-to-implement and requires a working knowledge of setting up online apps to integrate with each other.
The apps include Unbounce, Mailchimp, Wordpress and Samcart.

We want someone to take over execution this project with input from us ie we will provide the relevant marketing information, images etc, and you will put the system together.

This project would suit someone who has excellent project management skills and who has a detail-focused mindset. The successful applicant will be excellent at breaking a project down into tasks and allocating those tasks to people.
